title: AI-Native Ecosystem with Hub-and-Spoke Model
summary: Building integrated sustainability and energy management ecosystem with 2.5B euro AI investment, agentic AI for industrial applications

content.whatItIs: Schneider Electric announced a landmark multi-year initiative to build an integrated ecosystem for sustainability and energy management, backed by more than 2.5 billion euros AI investment by end of 2027.
howItWorks: AI Hub (established 2021): provides governance, develops data science expertise, collaborates with business units on deployment
'Hub-and-spoke' operating model designed to break down silos and ensure cohesive flow across the organization
Agentic AI for industrial applications: 'makes factory processes more intelligent' through autonomous decisions
Three-layer strategy: internal productivity, product augmentation, new value creation
7.5M customer service tickets processed annually—AI now auto-routes previously manual requests
content.coreInsight: Industrial companies should organize AI with a 'hub-and-spoke' model: a central hub for governance and expertise, with spokes connecting to business units for deployment. The three-layer strategy provides clear framework for prioritizing AI investments. Appointing a CAIO with a climate mission (not just technology) aligns AI strategy with business purpose.
content.keyMetrics: 2.5B euro AI investment by 2027. Target: 6B euro software and services revenue by early 2030s. Philippe Rambach, CAIO: 'Energy transition will not happen without AI.'
